summary:
WHAT?
A recruiter with a human touch and 100% focused on improving the candidate experience.

WHY?
After being a copy writer, an assistant, a customer service representative, and something else in between, I accidentally landed in recruitment where I finally found my professional passion. So, when given the chance to join this industry, I promised myself I would do my best to treat people, my candidates, in the same way I would like to be treated (at least, as much as I could). 

HOW?
Even though I’m usually seen as an introverted person, with my candidates I am chatty and curious. I am talkative and ask A LOT of questions, mainly because I love talking to people and learning from others. I get a boost of energy out of finding awesome people with that 'special something' that makes them different, I love listening to their stories and backgrounds, their dreams and expectations. 

WHO?
Always up for a (loud) laugh, a series junkie, Ikea fan and an avid eater. Because in 156 cm I don't have that much space for many extra kilos, you can find me at a CrossFit box, getting clumsily bruised, or running up, down and around the city, with earplugs on and thinking about that marathon in the bucket list!

Is there anything I could do for you? Feel free to drop me a line with the WHEN and/or WHERE. 
I'd be happy to talk to you.

profile_positions.description:
In Tech recruitment we are constantly looking for the best IT talent all-over-the-world. Yes, we do pay attention to impressive track records and well versed CVs, but what matters to us the most is to find IT colleagues that would be truly happy and challenged at bol.com. Colleagues that dare to dream, to discover, to keep experimenting and developing. Colleagues that are not afraid to fail (because with failure comes great wisdom), that enjoy working autonomously, with a lot of freedom and, of course, the responsibility that comes with it. 

As for our tasks, we source, we generate leads and we are end-to-end responsible for our recruitment processes. We expand and develop our network of IT professionals while actively participating in the business community, keeping in touch with applicants, engineers and managers. Our biggest KPI is our quality of hire. We strive to find the perfect culture add match, the IT crowd that makes an innovative contribution to the growth of bol.com by making a difference for our customers.
profile_positions.title: Tech Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Fujitsu is the No. 1 Japanese IT company and the world's seventh-largest IT services provider. With approximately 140000 employees, we support our customers in more than 100 countries, offering a full range of technology products, solutions and services and a competitive advantage in the era of digital transformation. 

As part of the Western Europe Talent Acquisition team located in Maarssen, The Netherlands, I was responsible for finding the right candidates for our vacancies in Spain and, sometimes, Portugal. Within the team, we handled vacancy requests from beginning to end and lead the full recruitment process. We coordinated all day to day recruitment activities including candidate sourcing, building an ongoing pipeline, advertising vacancies, screening applications, setting up interviews and taking care of regular administrative tasks.

By being in contact with the HR department, hiring managers and both internal and external stakeholders in Spain, I got a full understanding of the local needs and strived to create synergy within the team, the department and further alliances across the organization.
profile_positions.title: International Recruiter - Talent Acquisition Western Europe - Spain

profile_positions.description:
QSXL is an international search company specialized in recruitment through the use of data driven solutions and using the internet as a Database. With offices located in The Netherlands (HQ), Slovakia and South Africa, QSXL focuses its business on data driven searching and consultancy. 

Updating job descriptions, structuring landing pages and crafting recruiting emails to source and attract passive candidates.
Using Boolean searches to look for qualified candidates for Executive level roles
Interview candidates (via phone, video and in-person)
Serving as a link between the Search Center (Slovakia), clients and candidates.
Defining necessary requirements for open roles with the clients and involved hiring managers and providing shortlists of qualified candidates after completing interview processes
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Abroad Experience is a recruitment agency, located in Amersfoort, The Netherlands, specialized in the recruitment of international people with specific language skills. They work along with international companies, that have their European head office in The Netherlands, and focus on positions within finance, customer service, administration, inside sales, marketing, logistics and IT. 

Sourcing and attracting candidates by using databases and job boards. 
Screening candidates resumes and job applications, filtering candidates and conducting interviews for open positions.
Acting as an Account Manager, when needed, as an intermediary between candidates and our clients' hiring managers and HR teams.
profile_positions.title: International Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Founded by KLM in 1998, Cygnific offers Omni-Channel Customer Service Solutions in 18 languages with a strong focus in the hospitality, services, sales & social media industries.

On a 24/7 operation basis, and within guidelines set by Cygnific and KLM's e-commerce and Corporate communication department, solved and answered any queries and questions coming from customers worldwide and through various social media channels. 
Monitored different communication channels to ensure that the online reputation of KLM stayed in line with the desired brand position. 
Gave information to customers on flight fares, availability and schedules and answered their questions about products offered by KLM and Flying Blue. 
Recognized sales opportunities to act upon them and increase turnover for KLM. 
Provided assistance and support to other service centers and travel agencies, when needed.
profile_positions.title: Social Media and Customer Relations for KLM / Spanish and English speaking markets

profile_positions.description:
Plan and organize meetings, taking action points and writing minutes.
Organize travel itineraries
Read, monitor and respond to corporate emails, prepare and draft correspondence and prepare presentations for diverse projects.
Liaise and work as a bridge between the BabyFoods Team and other internal departments. 
Coordination of the Annual Global Marketing Conference. 
Control of budget and procurement processes with marketing suppliers. 
Development and maintenance of Strategy and Insights Intranet site.
profile_positions.title: P.A. to the BabyFoods Global Marketing Director and Team Assistant

profile_positions.description:
- Trends Analyst for McDonald’s 

Development of the monthly and annual Competitors analysis for the McDonald’s account including communication across all media channels, promotion strategy and PR activities.

- Personal Assistant to the General Manager and the Accounts Department

Provide general support to Account Directors and Account Executives of the agency. 
Co-creation of the New Trade/Business database for business acquisition and business development purposes. Research and identification of potential new clients and accounts. 
Translations into native and foreign languages. 
Create and coordinate direct mailings and newsletters, manage email database. 
Preparation of business presentations and proposals. 
Travel and meetings arrangements.
profile_positions.title: Trends Analyst / P.A. to the General Manager and the Accounts Department

profile_positions.description:
Assist project managers and engineers in key tasks of the project execution.
Track project deliverables, constantly monitor and report on progress of the project to all stakeholders.
Present reports defining project progress, problems and solutions.
Procurement of new materials.
Schedule and coordinate meetings, travel plans and general appointments.
Link between Headquarters and on-site plant teams to exchange key project information.
Preparation of monthly and annual reports.
profile_positions.title: Project Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Co-lead the development of the corporate image and identity.
Creation and maintenance of the corporate website (definition of the internal website infrastructure, content development, design, functionality and maintenance) working along with graphic designers and IT engineers. 
Communication with media channels, creation of press notes and corporate articles. 
Support in HR tasks.
profile_positions.title: Content Consultant / Media and Communications Coordinator
